description:
Executive/Personal Assistant | $130-$150k
Publicly Held Real Estate Firm is seeking an Executive Assistant to support the Chainman and CEO. The ideal candidate will excel at problem-solving and optimizing the executive's schedule for maximum productivity. This pivotal role requires someone exceptionally organized, professional, resourceful, and adaptable, thriving in a fast-paced setting. The day to day will consist of coordinating logistics for a variety of meetings, coordinate domestic and international travel to ensure smooth execution of all accommodations, process expense reports, run personal errands as needed.
Qualifications:
  • Bachelor’s degree preferred
  • Minimum of 10 years of experience supporting a C-Suite Executive
  • Experience working within a Fortune 500 company
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) and other relevant software.
  • Exceptional organizational and time management skills.
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills.
  • Ability to work independently and prioritize tasks effectively.
  • High level of discretion and confidentiality.
  • Excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to work well with all levels of internal management and staff, as well as outside clients and vendors.
benefits: Medical insurance, Vision insurance, Dental insurance, 401(k), Paid maternity leave
